definition: with relatively high volume, characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
details:
adverb
- with relatively high volume
= example: with relatively high volume
= synonyms: aloud
adjective
- characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
= example: characterized by or producing sound of great volume or intensity
- used chiefly as a direction or description in music
= synonyms: soft, piano, forte
- tastelessly showy
= synonyms: brassy, flashy, gaudy, cheap, meretricious, tawdry, flash, garish, gimcrack, tacky, tatty, trashy
